items.sentence: I still can\'t believe Mary and I are getting married.
I still have no idea why Tom doesn\'t want to do that.
What I told you about him also applies to his brother.
There is a bookstore in front of the department store.
This is by far the most interesting of all his novels.
Tom was the only one who saw Mary sneak into the room.
Tom was totally snockered before the party even began.
Tom wished he had put more money into that investment.
Tom wondered how long it would take to finish the job.
I\'m sure Tom is going to be hungry when he gets home.
I\'m sure the police will catch the robber eventually.
I\'m the one who convinced Tom not to do that anymore.
I\'m the one who taught Tom how to play the saxophone.
I\'ve already explained this to you many times before.
I\'ve already paid back all the money that I owed Tom.
Tom considered leaving school, but decided against it.
I certainly hope you\'re planning to come to my party.
I\'m not sure if that was a good thing or a bad thing.
If you want me to help you, all you have to do is ask.
Is there anything special you want to do this weekend?
